metadata.title: CVE-2018-10913 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An information disclosure vulnerability was discovered in glusterfs server.An attacker could issue a xattr request via glusterfs FUSE to determine theexistence of any file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glusterfs-client - 4.1.4-1
glusterfs-common - 4.1.4-1
glusterfs-server - 4.1.4-1
libgfapi0 - 4.1.4-1
libgfchangelog0 - 4.1.4-1
libgfrpc0 - 4.1.4-1
libgfxdr0 - 4.1.4-1
libglusterd0 - 4.1.4-1
libglusterfs0 - 4.1.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.4-1').
